edm:ProvidedCHO.dc:subject: Klassifikation (rvk): AP 88150
edm:ProvidedCHO.dc:title: TheShakers
edm:ProvidedCHO.bf:subtitle: coaching, analysis & performance
edm:ProvidedCHO.dc:description: Weitere Angaben: choreography by Doris Humphrey ; analysis anc coaching by Ernestine Stodelle ; additional coaching by Gail Corbin
Originally produced in 1997

The Doris Humphrey legacy series of documentaries gives behind-the-scenes analysis of each movement, phrase-by-phrase, of five Doris Humprhrey works: Air for the G string, The call/breath of fire, The shakers, Two estatic themes and Water study. Ernestine Stodelle, an original member of the Humphrey-Weidman Company, provides meticulous, inspiring coaching and commentary for each dance. Every film concludes with a complete performance of the work

Moderne dans

Enth.: Der @dritte Mann, Laboda. Apo xeno topo. Er sieht sie an, während sie ihn ansieht und er sieht zur Tür. Bubamaka. What am I bid? Fighting on the same side. Marielied. Nienafing. Tyne anew. Besame mucho. Chemtengure. Badutspringeren. Reality shock. Alle Vöglein sind schon weg. Candy man. Beyrouth ecoeurée. My way. Signora Luna. Zum kleinen Tod. There is still time. - Aufn.: 2. - 4. Juli 2004, live

edm:ProvidedCHO.dcterms:tableOfContents: Sleeping beauty : grand pas de deux(dancers: Veronica Tennant, Rudolf Nureyev ; music Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky ; choreography: Marius Petipa)
Giselle : act II pas de deux(dancers: Karen Kain, Frank Augustyn ; music: Adolphe Adam ; Choreography: Jean Coralli & Jules Perrot)
Swan lake : black swan pas de deux(dancers: Maja Plisetskaya, Alexander Bogatirev ; music: Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky ; choreography: Grigorovich, after Petipa and Ivanov)
Raymonda : pas de deux(dancers: Irina Kolpakova, Sergei Berezhnoi ; music: Alexander Glazunov ; Choreography: Marius Petipa)
Coppélia : pas de deux finale(dancers: Cynthia Gregory, Fernando Bujes ; music: Léo Delibes ; choreography and staging: Roni Mahler (after Saint-Leon))
Anyuta : pas de deux - Anyuta bids Farewell(dancers: Ekaterina Maximova, Marat Daukayev ; music: Valery Gavrilin ; choreography: Vladimir Vasilev)
Don Quixote : pas de deux finale(dancers: Nadezhda Pavlova, Vyacheslav Gordeev ; music: Ludwig Minkus ; choreography: Alexander Gorsky, after Marius Petipa)
Le baiser de la fèe : pas de deux(dancers Ludmila Vasileva, Vladimir Malakhov ; music: Igor Stravinsky ; choreography: N. Kasatkina & V. Vasiliev)
Romeo and Juliet : balcony scene pas de deux(dancers Ekaterina Maximova, Vladimir Vasiliev ; music: Sergei Prokofiev ; choreography: Leonid Lavrovsky)
Afternoon of a faun(dancers: Tanaquil LeClercq, Jaques d'Amboise ; music: Claude Debussy ; choreography: Jerome Robbins)
